products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Vanilla - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout vanilla allows you to add that subtle and refined touch of style to your home that it can be so hard to pin down. It's a gentle blend of cream and beige that sits elegantly in the background, giving your other colours the freedom to come to the fore and catch the eye. If you want to add something elegant and understated to the master bedroom then try combining vanilla with a matching rug atop a laminate floor.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), White - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout white is a roller blind that allows you to drift off into a deep sleep the moment your head hits the pillow. With a light and breezy design that's easy on the eye, and crafted with care from their signature blackout fabric, it's everything you need to create your own little oasis of calm. Matching trinity white with neutral walls and light stained floors is an inspired choice if you want to create a bedroom that you can rest and relax in before bedtime.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), White - Roller Blind
products.description: White might not be your first instinct when looking for a blackout blind, but don't rule out the palermo (blackout) white just because of its colour. When it comes to keeping out harmful and distracting uv rays, this blind comes top of the class. The wipe-clean fabric of the palermo range makes this the perfect choice for kitchen windows, and will really gleam paired with colourful patterns and light wood worktops.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Snowy Mountain - Roller Blind
products.description: Anthology (blackout) snowy mountain captures the colour and texture of one of the natural world's most incredible sights, and it does it all whilst creating a design that's fit for any contemporary home. The intricate stitching catches your attention up close, whilst the radiance of he brilliant white pulls you in from afar. Match anthology (blackout) snowy mountain with plenty of light greys and dark browns if you really want to amplify the natural colours on show.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout), Silk White - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of verdi (blackout) silk white is the way in which it sits there ever so luxurious, and yet it remains neutral at the same time. It's a hard balance to strike, but when you see it you'll wonder why you never thought of it before. Taking your decor in a luxury direction is what we all dream of, so why wait any longer? A black leather couch and a large rug under the coffee table would be ideal ways to take the living room where you want to go.
